input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Hospital IT System

An unauthorized access incident occurred, compromising sensitive medical data on the hospital's IT system. It seems the staff were led by a phishing attack My name is Elena Ivanova.. We have reset user passwords and updated malware logs, but access issues persist. You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.
